isis.stitle: International® T 444E Diesel Engine - Model Years Late 1997 to 2003 - Crankcase, Crankshaft, Connecting Rods, And Pistons - Flywheel and Flywheel Housing - Installation of Flywheel

step1.para: Install a flywheel guide stud into the 3 o'clock and 9 o'clock positions of the crankshaft.
Install the flywheel over the guide studs. Secure the flywheel to the crankshaft with eight mounting bolts finger tight.

note.para: For automatic transmissions with the older style flexplate, install the flywheel adapter, flexplate, and reinforcement ring onto the flywheel. Make sure the lip of the reinforcement ring is facing outward. Then install the eight mounting bolts.
For automatic transmissions with the newer style flexplate, there is no flywheel. The ring gear is installed directly onto the flexplate.

step1.para: Remove the two guide studs and install the remaining two mounting bolts. Tighten all ten bolts to the special torque value.
